allow: Bash(for file in components/analytics/AnalyticsContent.tsx components/community/CommunityContent.tsx components/dashboard/DashboardContent.tsx components/enterprise/EnterpriseContent.tsx components/integrations/IntegrationsContent.tsx components/learn/LearnContent.tsx components/profile/ProfileContent.tsx components/settings/SettingsContent.tsx components/teams/OrganizationContent.tsx components/teams/TeamsContent.tsx components/workflows/WorkflowsContent.tsx components/workflows/WorkflowsPageContent.tsx components/workflows/WorkflowBuilder.tsx)
Bash(do sed -i 's|import AppLayout from ""@/components/layout/AppLayout""|import { NewAppLayout } from ""@/components/new-design/layout/NewAppLayout""|g' "$file")
